title: Removing the Red Hat build of OpenTelemetry
subtitle: Uninstalling Collector instances and the OpenTelemetry Operator

abstract.para: This document describes how to remove Red Hat build of OpenTelemetry from an OpenShift cluster. Learn the proper sequence for removal: shutting down OpenTelemetry pods, removing OpenTelemetryCollector and OpenTelemetryInstrumentation instances, and uninstalling the OpenTelemetry Operator. Includes procedures for removing instances using both the web console Administrator view and the command-line interface, with verification steps to confirm successful removal.
